sentences.en: ...the serpent in the Garden of Eden.
Don't believe him, he is a serpent.
sentences.cn: 别相信他, 他是个狡猾的家伙.

sentences.en: He felt as if a serpent had spat venom into his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他感觉就像有一条蛇朝自己的双眼里喷射了毒液。

sentences.en: He knows the wiles of the serpent.
sentences.cn: 他知道阴险毒辣的人的种种诡计.

sentences.en: Serpent , we'll try our hand at a mark.
sentences.cn: 大蟒蛇, 我们得找个靶子,试试咱们的手气.

sentences.en: The forests adorn the earth - but shelter the serpent and the lion.
sentences.cn: 森林装饰着大地,但也隐藏着毒蛇和狮子.

sentences.en: The javelin penetrated the serpent's scales and pierced through to his entrails.
sentences.cn: 长矛穿过鳞片刺入了蛇口的内脏.
这条蛇震慑住了它要捕食的动物.

sentences.en: The serpent hisses where the sweet birds sing.
sentences.cn: 凡是有甜美的鸟歌唱的地方,都有毒蛇嘶嘶地叫.

sentences.en: The serpent tempted Eve to pick the forbidden fruit.
sentences.cn: 那条毒蛇诱骗夏娃摘取了禁果.

sentences.en: The Venetian gondola is as free and graceful in its gliding movement as a serpent.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯小艇划起来就象蟒蛇一样洒脱自在.

sentences.en: These winding and crooked courses are the goings of the serpent.
sentences.cn: 这些曲曲折折的行为可说是蛇走路的方式.

sentences.en: They believed that the serpent was capable of fascinating its prey.
sentences.cn: 他们相信蛇具备蛊惑猎物的能力.

sentences.en: We have had a grand voyage and seen a sea - serpent.
sentences.cn: 我们的航行非常棒.我们看到了 海蛇.

sentences.en: We must eat our fruit from the wily serpent's jaws.
sentences.cn: 我们必须从那条狡猾的蛇的嘴巴里去抢食果实.

trans.tran_en: a snake, especially a large one
